text: Lilia Torriani (30 November 1920 - 2003) was an Italian gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around at the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Italian female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Genoa
title: Lilia Torriani
